togglePaddingTop.fieldDescription: Switch between Default Padding (Off) and Reduced Padding (On)
togglePaddingTop.name: ./togglePaddingTop

togglePaddingBottom.fieldDescription: Switch between Default Padding (Off) and Reduced Padding (On)
togglePaddingBottom.name: ./togglePaddingBottom

enableTab1Data.fieldLabel: Select Tab Fields (Remove all Sub-Tabs to enable Main Tab)
enableTab1Data.name: ./tab1Enabled

borderEnable.fieldDescription: Check to Enable Border for Image
borderEnable.name: ./tab1/borderEnable

openLinkInNewTab.fieldDescription: Check to open link in New Tab. By default, link opens in same tab.
openLinkInNewTab.name: ./openLinkInNewTab

openLinkInNewTab.name: ./tab1/openLinkInNewTab

enableVideo.fieldDescription: Enable video (Optional). Author the associated video fields if enabled.
enableVideo.name: ./tab1/videoEnabled

bluePrimaryCta.fieldDescription: Check enables Blue background of CTA. (Default-White background)
bluePrimaryCta.name: ./tab1/bluePrimaryCta

openNewTabCta.name: ./tab1/openNewTabCta
